comment.body: 都是好奇猫，进来看看就溜了
这些号都是你注册的吗？？
@Mosen: 真人还是ID？找ID的话，右边新用户--〉浏览全部-->ctrl+F
So , 2/3 of the people very need ZeroNet. China's users need ZeroNet achieve DHT to find peers.If the china 's GFW blocks all the trackers of zeronet ,we can't use Zeronet.It is a boring thing.
@Ronin: You can @nofish ,this is the author of zeronet .
@Ysc3839: onlyzero.net这个代理好像出问题了，很多消息都没有。
咋我的名字还是显示这个呢？？？？我老早就改了

Yes，we must need to use a VPN proxy & obfs4 bridges  to connect to Tor network , If we don't use those ,we can't connect to Tor network. The tor tracker is also a problem for Chinese users.And sometimes,I am as a new user on another computer,It can NOT auto download the ZeroNet from Github.And [https://zeronet.io](https://zeronet.io) language button is so small,some new users don't know the site has they mother land language .the `Chinese(Simplified) `should translate to `中文简体`
